This is a listing of [[Oracle Corporation]]'s corporate acquisitions, including acquisitions of both companies and individual products. Oracle's version is [http://www.oracle.com/us/corporate/Acquisitions/index.html here], but does not include value of the acquisition. See also [[:Category:Sun Microsystems acquisitions]] (Sun was acquired by Oracle). {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Acquisition date ! Company !class="unsortable"|Business ! Valuation
